name: Chatter
description: You shout a series of disorienting words at a creature, scrambling their senses. Make a ranged attack. On a hit, deal 1d10 + MOVE flying damage and cause the target to become confused.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.

effect.name: Brings down the energy of any Pok√©mon that have already used a move this turn.
effect.effect: Lowers the crowd meter by the number of Pokemon that raised the crowd meter this turn.
